analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol:
	Contract WTPToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol#235-236)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.22 (/unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_recipients' of WTPToken.sendBatchCS (/unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_values' of WTPToken.sendBatchCS (/unique_chucks/3/0x1680cfdad75da2bb56ded4f36bb9423c86ffa7b7.sol#190-191) is not in mixedCase
